CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.8b, patientdrugstartdateformat (3N) --> Value should be 102 AND B.1.8c, patientdrugstartdate (8N) --> convert to CCYYMMDD E2B (R2): B.1.10.8b, parentdrugstartdateformat (3N) --> Value should be 102 AND B.1.10.8c, parentdrugstartdate (8N) --> convert to CCYYMMDD
E2B (R3): D.8.r.4 Start Date E2B (R3): D.10.8.r.4 Start Date Conformance: Optional Data Type: Date / Time OID: None Value Allowed: See Appendix II for further information. nullFlavor: MSK, ASKU, NASK
CustomField.label: Start Date
